attributes.action: Ban Adult themed tv channls during daytime hours
attributes.additional_details:
Surely time has come that a child searching for his favourite television programme cannot mistakenly type in a 3 digit code that brings up a channel in which an adult lady is led in skimpy outfit, revealing her underwear and moving in seductive ways.

These channels have there place for adult nature after the watershed, but our children already witnessing adult themes in so many ways, should be spared these sights when watching television.
